version_description: Minor bug fixes

- we have doubled down on security, adding features to make your app even safer!
- bug fixes and optimisation

- More security features to protect your account. We're going to start notifying you if we detect any suspicious behaviour related to your account!
- If you found us on a merchant site and applied on our app, we now let you continue your transactions from where you left off
- Kredivo transactions live feed on your home screen

- Kredivo transactions live feed on your home screen
- bug fixes and optimisation

- Fixed bug for Pay in 30 application
- Crash fixes
Facebook login issue fixed

Buy pulsa, data package, and PLN token and pay your PLN bill directly INSIDE Kredivo app now!
Use your 30 days credit limit to buy pulsa, data package, PLN token, and PLN bill instantly and pay back interest-free within 30 days.
Also coming soon...
BPJS, PDAM, and phone postpaid bill payments, directly inside Kredivo app.
Kredivo installment calculator is now available under settings.
- Bug fixes and optimization

- Personal loan is now available for select users!
- It's now easier than ever to upgrade to installment account. Try it now!
- Information on outstanding loan is now clearer, previously it wasn't shown. That one's on me (whoops).
- It's been awhile since we last release an iOS version. Again, so sorry for this!
- Wanna watch Asian Games? Go to Blibli.com and buy the tickets with Kredivo!

- bug fixes (which produced more bugs)
- user interface enhancements (plenty were enhanced, can you spot them all?)

- Book airplane ticket from inside the app
- Registration now uses selfie instead of Facebook connect
- Personal loan mini & jumbo to suit your need
- Kredivo is now available in Yogyakarta, Solo, Makassar, & Bali!
- QR transaction for select users
- Save your favorite number when buying pulsa & data package
- Bug fixes and enhancements
- Bug enhancements & app fixes
- Bug enhancements & app fixes

- The holy Ramadhan month is upon us again, Kredivo proudly presents our donation feature through Kitabisa. Let's help our brothers and sisters who are not as fortunate as us in this holy month.
- Our referral program is now back! Get your friends to apply to Kredivo and get up to Rp 100,000 off for you and your friends!
- The change PIN feature is now available (apology for always forgetting this crucial feature in the past)
- New look for our merchant page
- You can now make transactions at our offline merchants using Kredivo's QR code
- Bug fixes and app enhancements

- Premium users can now request for credit limit increase
- Bug fixes and app enhancements

- Premium users can now request for credit limit increase
- Bug fixes and app enhancements

- 2-factor authentication for login. Never give your OTP to anyone! Not even to Ryan Reynolds or Kylie Jenner!
- Product recommendation for you to buy. This feature is still in beta, so apologies for any weird recommendations. Or maybe that's what you want? Either way we're cool with your life choices as long as you pay on time.
- Change email. It does exactly as advertised, seriously
- Validate mother's name. We want your mom's legal name, we have no interest in knowing what you call her daily.

- Fixed a bug that wasn't caused by us, but by iOS 13
- Sorry, no dark mode yet

- Register for premium account using NPWP (don't have it? go to your nearest KKP!)
- WhatsApp option for OTP in case the SMS just couldn't make it
- Kredivo Points, get points if you make on time payment
- Bug fixes to ensure our app stays amazing, just the way it is

- Register for premium account using NPWP (don't have it? go to your nearest KKP!)
- WhatsApp option for OTP in case the SMS just couldn't make it
- Kredivo Points, get points if you make on time payment
- Bug fixes to ensure our app stays amazing, just the way it is

"DISCOVER MORE EXTRA

The day is finally here! Leap into great finds!

Found something you really, really love but worried that you might exceed your credit limit? We got you!

Add one extra item into your cart and use our new Downpayment feature! Pay the excess upfront as downpayment. Go Buy it now and Pay it later with Kredivo Installment!

And there's more! Get a hassle-free limit increase. No bank, no worries. Simply upload NPWP to upgrade your account. Viola, you'll be upgraded in no time.

So what are you waiting for? Update your Kredivo app now to enjoy these features!"
Some bugs were crushed!

EXTRA

Just relax, Kredivo gives you NEW FEATURES to ease your day amidst this COVID-19 Quarantine.

1. Enjoy paying your internet or cable tv bill with Kredivo. Get your internet and cable tv bill covered now, pay it later in 30 days. Extra sweet!
2. New UI look for the app, including dark mode support and a fancy yellow box on the dashboard to give you the latest update about Kredivo

Let's get your Kredivo app updated now and enjoy these extra features!

EXTRA

Just relax, Kredivo gives you NEW FEATURES to ease your day amidst this COVID-19 Quarantine.

1. Enjoy paying your internet or cable tv bill with Kredivo. Get your internet and cable tv bill covered now, pay it later in 30 days. Extra sweet!
2. New UI look for the app, including dark mode support and a fancy yellow box on the dashboard to give you the latest update about Kredivo

Let's get your Kredivo app updated now and enjoy these extra features!

TWO NEW FEATURES ready to power you through this new normal.

1) Pay on the go with our new BARCODE FEATURE. Enjoy seamless payment at McDonald's with this new feature.

2) Get ready to receive transaction notifications and payment reminders via WhatsApp. Activate your WhatsApp notification on the setting, and ta-da, you are set to get transaction and payment information right to your WhatsApp.

Update your Kredivo app now and enjoy our new features!
We've managed to squish some bugs!

Be on the lookout for all discount hunters!

Get an extra discount with no sweat: no-fuss, no-hassle inputting promo code.

In just one click, you can easily get chopped price by simply selecting vouchers during checkout on both online & offline merchants.

Let's update your Kredivo now and check available vouchers for you!
We managed to vanquish some pesky bugs!
We managed to squish some bugs
Some bugs were definitely harmed during this application development process

Great news!

Now, selected Kredivo Premium can make offline transaction at merchants with GPN logo throughout Indonesia simply using Kredivo Card since it's connected to your Kredivo limit. And, you can pay it later.

Update Kredivo app now, and get your Kredivo Card!
Some bugs were vanquished

In this latest version, you can make installment transactions using barcodes at various offline merchants.

Update now!

Account registration is now easier than ever, try our new and improved registration flow and prepare to be mind blown!
Also we've killed several bugs.

Account registration is now easier than ever, try our new and improved registration flow and prepare to be mind blown!

Also we've killed several bugs.
We managed to get rid of some pesky bugs.
